sentences: Meil on plaan minna lõunasse puhkama.
context: The word 'lõunasse' is an Estonian adverb that indicates movement toward or into the southern direction. It is formed from the noun 'lõuna' (south) by adding the illative case suffix '-sse', which indicates motion into a place. This directional form is commonly used when describing travel, relocation, or general movement toward southern regions.
